title: Prison Break: Architect Tycoon
description: Prison Break: Architect Tycoon is an action game in which you are the main prison guard tasked with securing the prison. Your job is to ensure that no prisoners can escape or, worse, kill you, leading to a game over. You start with an empty prison and transform it into a secure facility. Build inmate cells, reinforce doors, install surveillance cameras, and recruit additional guards. Improve your warden to handle a larger population of prisoners efficiently. Each facility offers unique challenges, providing a captivating experience for players of all ages.
